input.sentences: i met up with an old friend with whom i reconnected on a dating site .
i remembered she was artsy so i decided to take her out to an art showing .
it had interesting works | and a good variety | too .
it was properly crowded at the gallery | so it made the outing that much more enjoyable .
on the way home she wanted to stop by a local tattoo shop to get her gauges upsized . it was a funny ending to a nice day .
output.sentences: This is the site where we all reconnected with each other, and met once again.
I remembered all the fond memories we had, and decided that I liked the artsy vibe here.
There is certainly a variety of things to take in.
I am so glad I can properly appreciate the outing we have and this spectacular gallery.
It would be a good idea if they upsized it and turned it into a tattoo parlor for it to be a local stop.
